tns:patch.keyword: Fill amp_activity_version with group id's for each activity
tns:patch.author: Diego Dimunzio

script.lang: UPDATE amp_activity_version SET amp_activity_group_id =amp_activity_group.amp_activity_group_id FROM amp_activity_group WHERE amp_activity_group.amp_activity_last_version_id = amp_activity_version.amp_activity_id;
